1.title: 2011 Special
1.plot: It's been six months since we've last seen Adam and Noah Levy, owners of LIC Motorsports, and a lot has happened. Working out of their repair shop in Northern California, the two brothers battle each other and the limitations of their underfunded dream.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Episode 1 introduces the brothers and their shop, and follows them as prepare the car for the next race at the Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, California. They are fighting an uphill battle. How will they fare? Will they even finish the car in time? Episode 1 is only the first of this multi-part documentary.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Episode 2 of The Underdogs reveals a whole new side of brothers Adam and Noah Levy. Watch as they prepare their race-bred Subaru for the next Redline Time Attack event at Willow Springs Raceway in Rosamond, California. Episode 2 takes a closer look at the brothers' humble beginnings, and the creation of LIC Motorsports. But is their experience enough to translate into a win as they struggle for perfection on Willow Springs' fast and unforgiving track?

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Episode 3 of The Underdogs follows brothers Adam and Noah Levy as they struggle to rectify the issues with their Subaru before the next Time Attack event at Spring Mountain Raceway near Las Vegas. The car is tested, gutted and transformed in an effort to improve its qualities, but will this be enough to keep it on the track and recapture the team's drive for the championship?

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Episode 4 of the Underdogs will take brothers Adam and Noah Levy into new territory after a rain storm settles over the upcoming time attack event. Having never attempted a race in these conditions before, the brothers scramble to prepare the car for the wet weather ahead, knowing that their Subaru will be tested to its limits at the notoriously treacherous Infineon Raceway in Sonoma, CA. Will they be able to set a competitive time? Will the car even survive?

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The Season Finale of The Underdogs joins Noah and Adam Levy as they take their Subaru to the SEMA Auto Show in Las Vegas, and then to Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, CA, where they will compete for the Redline Time Attack championship. Ultimately, it becomes clear that there is more at stake. Episode 5 brings to light the brothers' daily struggle to balance personal life with business. How will they cope when a mountain rises in their path? What will become of LIC Motorsports?

locations: Spring Mountain Motor Resort and Country Club, Pahrump, Nevada, USA::(aka Spring Mountain Motorsports Ranch)
Willow Springs International Motorsports Park, Rosamond, California, USA
Auto Club Speedway, 9300 Cherry Avenue, Fontana, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: The Underdogs is an episodic journey into the lives of brothers Adam and Noah Levy, owners of LIC Motorsports. Watch as they prepare their race-bred Subaru STi for battle in the Redline Time Attack race series. In each episode, they will stand face to face with teams many times their size and funding. Will they fall behind the competition, or can they accomplish the unthinkable? The odds are against them. They are The Underdogs.
imdb.title: The Underdogs
plot: _The Underdogs_ (qv) is an episodic journey into the lives of brothers Adam and Noah Levy, owners of LIC Motorsports. Watch as they prepare their race-bred Subaru STi for battle in the Redline Time Attack race series. In each episode, they will stand face to face with teams many times their size and funding. Will they fall behind the competition, or can they accomplish the unthinkable? The odds are against them. They are _The Underdogs_ (qv).::Brandon Katcher
